content.tagline: A skilled point guard with court vision and leadership. Combining basketball IQ with athletic ability. Creating plays and leading teammates to victory.

about.paragraph1: I'm a dedicated basketball player who started playing at the age of 8. My natural court vision and leadership abilities have helped me excel as a point guard and team captain.
about.paragraph2: What sets me apart is my basketball intelligence and ability to control the tempo of the game. I study NBA games constantly, analyzing play patterns and learning from the best point guards. My coaches often commend my decision-making and ability to make my teammates better.
about.paragraph3: I bring leadership and intensity to every practice and game. Whether it's early morning shooting practice or late-night film study, I'm always looking for ways to improve. My work ethic is unmatched - I believe that success comes from preparation and mental toughness.

coreValues: Leadership on and off the court

videos.title: Scoring Ability
videos.description: Three-point shooting and driving to the basket
